title: ShetKid
author: ShetKid
created_time: November 19, 2023, 11:14:23 PMLast edit: November 23, 2023, 01:27:55 PM by ShetKid
content: Hey all,I have a government cheque on hold until Friday and I just need up to $100 until then. Willing to show bank proof that the cheque is on hold for X amount (a lot more than what I am asking)I can accept this loan in BTC/ETH as will as repay in BTC/ETH, by this Friday November 24, 2023, interest rates etc can be discussed.Best:)

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: 1. Your account has a red tag for trying to impersonate Tomatocage2. Your account just woke up and there was a change in the email address. Hacked, perhaps.3. Nobody cares about bank proof of your cheque.

comments.author: ShetKid
comments.body: Nope,Not true and not verified. Accused and impersonated by a random user Been inactive for this reason for a couple years, but I’m all for legitimate business

comments.author: condoras
comments.body: Quote from: ShetKid on November 19, 2023, 11:47:25 PMNope,Not true and not verified. Accused and impersonated by a random user Been inactive for this reason for a couple years, but I’m all for legitimate businessSo, as you said, you have been out of the forum because a random user accused you for an imposter. And this simple question arises: Why you didn't defend yourself from this accusation but instead decided to leave and come up today and the first thing was to ask for an uncollateralized loan?
